script.title: op-pingsweep.slax
script.author: rsankar
script.synopsis: Send a series of ping to remote-host, useful for troubleshooting MTU/MSS issues
script.description: This script performs pings to remote-host, which may be useful for troubleshooting MTU/MSS issues. Size of the packet starts from $min-size, increases by $step and ends at $max-size.
